text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
SpecializesCodingThe child code is a more narrow version of the concept represented by the parent code. I.e. Every child concept is also a valid parent concept. Used to allow determination of subsumption. Must be transitive, irreflexive, antisymmetric.
GeneralizesCodingInverse of Specializes. Only included as a derived relationship.
internalIdhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v3-internal-idcodeThe internal identifier for the concept in the HL7 Access database repository.
statushttp://hl7.org/fhir/concept-properties#statuscodeDesignation of a concept's state. Normally is not populated unless the state is retired.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-PatientImportance defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitioninternalIdstatus
BM Board MemberBoard member of health care organization19266active
DFM Physician Family MemberFamily member of staff physician19269active
DR Staff PhysicianMember of the health care organization physician staff19267active
FD Financial DonorFinancial donor to the health care organization19268active
FOR Foreign DignitaryForeign citizen dignitary of interest to the health care organization19274active
GOVT Government DignitaryGovernment dignitary of interest to the organization19270active
SFM Staff Family MemberFamily member of staff member19271active
STF Staff MemberStaff member of the health care organization19272active
VIP Very Important PersonVery important person of interest to the health care organization19273active

property.description: The child code is a more narrow version of the concept represented by the parent code.  I.e. Every child concept is also a valid parent concept.  Used to allow determination of subsumption.  Must be transitive, irreflexive, antisymmetric.
Inverse of Specializes.  Only included as a derived relationship.
The internal identifier for the concept in the HL7 Access database repository.
Designation of a concept's state. Normally is not populated unless the state is retired.

concept.definition: Board member of health care organization
Member of the health care organization physician staff
Financial donor to the health care organization
Foreign citizen dignitary of interest to the health care organization
Government dignitary of interest to the organization
Staff member of the health care organization
Very important person of interest to the health care organization
